alert.note: Alert for Attala; Carroll; Holmes; Humphreys; Leflore; Sunflower (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 2:23PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Sunflower, Holmes, Carroll, southern Leflore, Attala and northeastern Humphreys Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 223 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Inverness to near Thornton to near Ebenezer. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Tchula, Pickens, Howard, Tolarville, Ebenezer and Franklin around 230 PM CDT. Goodman, Swiftown and Brozville around 235 PM CDT. Lexington around 240 PM CDT. Itta Bena, Morgan City and Newport around 245 PM CDT. Sallis, Quito and Bowling Green around 250 PM CDT. Sidon, Mcadams and Emory around 255 PM CDT. Greenwood, Kosciusko, West and Seven Pines around 300 PM CDT. Vaiden and Possumneck around 305 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central Mississippi.

area.areaDesc: Attala; Carroll; Holmes; Humphreys; Leflore; Sunflower
